label: POLR3A-related disorder
definition: Disorder in which the cause of disease is a variation in the POLR3A gene.

label: POLR3B-related disorder
definition: Disorder in which the cause of disease is a variation in the POLR3B gene.

label: POLR1C-related disorder
definition: Disorder in which the cause of disease is a variation in the POLR1C gene.

label: spastic triplegia
definition: A form of spastic cerebral palsy affecting three limbs; this could be both arms and a leg, or both legs and an arm. In some instances, it has referred to one upper and one lower extremity and the face.

label: post-treatment Lyme disease syndrome
definition: A disorder caused by the infection in Lyme disease and manifesting after the original infection.

label: MYH10-related neurodevelopmental disorder with congenital anomalies
definition: An autosomal dominant complex neurodevelopmental disorder in which the cause of the disease is a mutation in the MYH10 gene.

label: POLR3-related leukodystrophy
definition: Hypomyelinating leukodystrophy disorder in which is caused of the disease is a variation in any of the genes encoding POLR3 (RNA polymerase III) subunits, including POLR3A, POLR3B and POLR1C. This disorder is characterized by the association of dental abnormalities (delayed dentition, abnormal order of dentition, hypodontia), hypogonadotropic hypogonadism, and hypomyelinating leukodystrophy manifesting with neurodevelopmental delay or regression and/or progressive cerebellar symptoms.

label: ataxic diplegic cerebral palsy
definition: A mixed cerebral palsy that is characterized by pathogenetic and clinical presentations of both ataxic cerebral palsy and spastic diplegia. In ataxic diplegic children, all extremities are neurologically affected. There is more voluntary control in the upper extremities, spasticity and stiffness in the lower extremities that affect childrenâ€™s ability to roll, sit, stand, and ambulate; as well as signs and symptoms of loss of balance and coordination.

label: auto-brewery syndrome
definition: An acquired metabolic disease that is characterized by the endogenous production of ethanol produced through endogenous fermentation by fungi or bacteria in the gastrointestinal system, oral cavity, or urinary system and typically presents with the signs of alcohol intoxication.

label: bladder fermentation syndrome
definition: An acquired metabolic disease that is characterized by ethanol fermentation in the bladder and the absence of alcoholic intoxication.

label: intrathyroid thymic carcinoma
definition: A thyroid gland carcinoma composed of groups of carcinoma cells with thymic epithelial differentiation.

label: thyroid gland cribriform morular carcinoma
definition: A thyroid gland carcinoma that is characterized by the presence of cribriform, trabecular, follicular, papillary, and solid growth patterns and squamoid morulae formation.

label: thyroid gland mixed medullary and follicular cell-derived carcinoma
definition: A thyroid gland carcinoma containing a medullary carcinoma component that is immunohistochemically positive for calcitonin, and follicular cell-derived carcinoma component that is immunohistochemically positive for thyroglobulin.

label: thyroid gland mucinous carcinoma
definition: A thyroid gland carcinoma that is characterized by the presence of clusters of malignant epithelial cells associated with abundant extracellular mucin deposition.

label: neurodevelopmental disorder with characteristic facial and ectodermal features and tetraparesis 1
Parkinson disease 26, autosomal dominant, susceptibility to
brain abnormalities-severe developmental delay-facial dysmorphism-intellectual disability syndrome due to MEF2C mutation
littoral cell hemangioma of the spleen
pediatric high-grade glioma
definition: A malignant high-grade glioma that occurs during childhood in the central nervous system.

label: anti-MDA5 dermatomyositis
definition: A dermatomyositis characterized by the presence of anti-MDA5 autoantibodies. It is often associated with dermatomyositis rashes, amyopathic or hypomyopathic muscle involvement and interstitial lung disease, frequently as a rapid progressive course and high mortality.

label: anti-Mi2 dermatomyositis
definition: A dermatomyositis characterized by the presence of anti-Mi2 autoantibodies.

label: anti-NXP2 dermatomyositis
definition: A dermatomyositis characterized by the presence of anti-NXP2 autoantibodies.

label: anti-TIF1 dermatomyositis
definition: A dermatomyositis characterized by the presence of anti-TIF1 autoantibodies.

label: anti-SAE dermatomyositis
definition: A dermatomyositis characterized by the presence of anti-SAE autoantibodies.

label: hypomyopathic dermatomyositis
definition: A clinically amyopathic dermatomyositis with no subjective symptoms of skeletal muscle weakness but objective findings of muscle involvement (elevated aldolase level).

label: clinically amyopathic dermatomyositis
definition: A dermatomyositis with cutaneous features but no skeletal muscle weakness.

label: Bernard-Soulier syndrome, GP9-related, dog
definition: Hereditary macrothrombocytes and mild-to-moderate thrombocytopenia with a bleeding tendency in dogs due to a variation in the GP9 gene.

label: glycogen storage disease, G6PC1-related, dog
definition: Any glycogen storage disease that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the G6PC1 gene.

label: glycogen storage disease, PFKM-related, dog
definition: Any glycogen storage disease that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the PFKM gene.

label: glycogen storage disease, PYGM-related, cattle
definition: Any glycogen storage disease that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the PYGM gene.

label: glycogen storage disease, PYGM-related, sheep
definition: Any glycogen storage disease that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the PYGM gene.

label: glycogen storage disease, AGL-related, dog
definition: Any glycogen storage disease that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the AGL gene.

label: tyrosinemia type 1, FAH-related, pig
definition: Any deficiency in fumarylacetoacetate hydrolase that occurs in pigs due to a mutation in the FAH gene created by genetic engineering or gene editing. Fumarylacetoacetate hydrolase is an enzyme that catalyzes the last step of tyrosine metabolism.

label: tyrosinemia type 1, FAH-related, rabbit
definition: Any deficiency in fumarylacetoacetate hydrolase that occurs in rabbits due to a mutation in the FAH gene created by genetic engineering or gene editing. Fumarylacetoacetate hydrolase is an enzyme that catalyzes the last step of tyrosine metabolism.

label: leukocyte adhesion deficiency, ITGB2-related, dog
definition: Any leukocyte adhesion deficiency that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the ITGB2 gene.

label: leukocyte adhesion deficiency, ITGB2-related, domestic cat
definition: Any leukocyte adhesion deficiency that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the ITGB2 gene.

label: leukocyte adhesion deficiency, ITGB2-related, cattle
definition: Any leukocyte adhesion deficiency that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the ITGB2 gene.

label: leukocyte adhesion deficiency, FERMT3-related, dog
definition: Any leukocyte adhesion deficiency that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the FERMT3 gene.

label: focal nonepidermolytic palmoplantar keratoderma, KRT16-related, dog
definition: Any painful thickening of the footpads with severe keratinous proliferations and fissures that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the KRT16 gene.

label: GM1 gangliosidosis, GLB1-related, dog
definition: A lysosomal storage disease in dogs due to a mutation in the GLB1 gene. There is a buildup of GM1 gangliosides in tissues due to a lack of the enzyme beta-galactosidase. It is characterised by progressive neuromuscular dysfunction and impaired growth from an early age.

label: GM1 gangliosidosis, GLB1-related, domestic cat
definition: A lysosomal storage disease in cats due to a mutation in the GLB1 gene. There is a buildup of GM1 gangliosides in tissues due to a lack of the enzyme beta-galactosidase. It is characterised by progressive neuromuscular dysfunction and impaired growth from an early age.

label: GM1 gangliosidosis, cattle
definition: A lysosomal storage disease in cattle. There is a buildup of GM1 gangliosides in tissues due to a lack of the enzyme beta-galactosidase. It is characterised by progressive neuromuscular dysfunction and impaired growth from an early age.

label: GM1 gangliosidosis GLB1-related, sheep
definition: A lysosomal storage disease in sheep due to a mutation in the GLB1 gene. There is a buildup of GM1 gangliosides in tissues due to a lack of the enzyme beta-galactosidase. It is characterised by progressive neuromuscular dysfunction and impaired growth from an early age.

label: glycogen storage disease II, Japanese quail
definition: A lysosomal storage disease in which there is a buildup of glycogen due to a lack of the enzyme alpha-glucosidase in Japanese quail.

label: glycogen storage disease, GAA-related, dog
definition: Any glycogen storage disease that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the GAA gene.

label: glycogen storage disease, GAA-related, domestic cat
definition: Any glycogen storage disease that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the GAA gene.

label: glycogen storage disease, GAA-related, cattle
definition: Any glycogen storage disease that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the GAA gene.

label: glycogen storage disease II, sheep
definition: A lysosomal storage disease in which there is a buildup of glycogen due to a lack of the enzyme alpha-glucosidase in sheep.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis, GNS-related, goat
definition: Any mucopolysaccharidosis that occurs in goats due to a mutation in the GNS gene.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis, ARSB-related, dog
definition: Any mucopolysaccharidosis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the ARSB gene.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis, ARSB-related, domestic cat
definition: Any mucopolysaccharidosis that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the ARSB gene.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis, GUSB-related, dog
definition: Any mucopolysaccharidosis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the GUSB gene.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis, GUSB-related, domestic cat
definition: Any mucopolysaccharidosis that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the GUSB gene.

label: Niemann-Pick disease, type C, dog
definition: A lysosomal storage disease characterised by impaired unesterified cholesterol and sphingomyelin transport and metabolism, resulting in the accumulation of un-esterified cholesterol and glycosphingolipids within late endosomes and lysosomes that occurs in dogs. Affected animals present with hepatosplenomegaly, neurological degeneration and premature death.

label: Niemann-Pick disease, NPC1-related, domestic cat
definition: A lysosomal storage disease characterised by impaired unesterified cholesterol and sphingomyelin transport and metabolism, resulting in the accumulation of un-esterified cholesterol and glycosphingolipids within late endosomes and lysosomes that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the NPC1 gene. Affected animals present with hepatosplenomegaly, neurological degeneration and premature death.

label: Niemann-Pick disease, NPC1-related, cattle
definition: A lysosomal storage disease characterised by impaired unesterified cholesterol and sphingomyelin transport and metabolism, resulting in the accumulation of un-esterified cholesterol and glycosphingolipids within late endosomes and lysosomes that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the NPC1 gene. Affected animals present with hepatosplenomegaly, neurological degeneration and premature death.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis, SGSH-related, dog
definition: Any mucopolysaccharidosis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the SGSH gene.

label: GM2 gangliosidosis, GM2A-related, domestic cat
definition: A lysosomal storage disease in cats due to a mutation in the GM2A gene. There is a buildup of G(M2) gangliosides in tissues. It is characterised by progressive neuromuscular dysfunction.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, CLN6-related, dog
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the CLN6 gene.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, CLN6-related, domestic cat
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the CLN6 gene.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, CLN6-related, sheep
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the CLN6 gene.

label: GM2 gangliosidosis, springbok
definition: A lysosomal storage disease in springboks. There is a buildup of GM2 gangliosides in tissues due to the lack of the enzyme hexosaminidase.

label: GM2 gangliosidosis, HEXB-related dog
definition: A lysosomal storage disease in dogs due to a mutation in the HEXB gene. There is a buildup of GM2 gangliosides in tissues due to the lack of the enzyme hexosaminidase. Characterised by progressive neuromuscular dysfunction and impaired growth from an early age.

label: GM2 gangliosidosis, HEXB-related, domestic cat
definition: A lysosomal storage disease in cats due to a mutation in the HEXB gene. There is a buildup of GM2 gangliosides in tissues due to the lack of the enzyme hexosaminidase. Characterised by progressive neuromuscular dysfunction and impaired growth from an early age.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, TPP1-related, dog
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the TPP1 gene.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, TPP1-related, pig
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in pigs due to a mutation in the TPP1 gene created using gene editing.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, CLN5-related, dog
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the CLN5 gene.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, CLN5-related, cattle
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the CLN5 gene.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, CLN5-related, sheep
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the CLN5 gene.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, PPT1-related, dog
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the PPT1 gene.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, PPT1-related, sheep
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the PPT1 gene created using CRISPR/Cas9 gene editing.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, CTSD-related, dog
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the CTSD gene.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, CTSD-related, sheep
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the CTSD gene.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, CLN8, dog
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the CLN8 gene.

label: sphingomyelin lipidosis, raccoon
definition: Any lysosomal storage disease consistent with sphingomyelin lipidosis that occurs in raccoons.

label: Niemann-Pick disease, SMPD1-related, domestic cat
definition: Any lysosomal disease characterized by the accumulation of sphingomyelin and cholesterol in lysosomes that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the SMPD1 gene.

label: sphingomyelinase deficiency, cattle
definition: Neurological disease characterized by ataxia, hypermetria, wide-base stance, and strabismus that occurs in cattle due to a sphingomyelinase deficiency resulting in the accumulation of sphingomyelin in neurons and macrophages.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, Japanese macaque
definition: Neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in Japanese macaques. Affected macaques display progressive neurological deficits including visual impairment, tremor, incoordination, ataxia and impaired balance.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, MFSD8-related, dog
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the MFSD8 gene.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, MFSD8-related, domestic cat
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the MFSD8 gene.

label: Niemann-Pick disease, NPC2-related, domestic cat
definition: A lysosomal storage disorders characterized by characterized by the accumulation of unesterified cholesterol and glycolipids in cellular lysosomes and late endosomes that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the NPC2 gene.

label: neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis, CLN3-related, pig
definition: Any neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis that occurs in pigs due to a mutation in the CLN3 gene created using gene editing.

label: Gaucher disease, GBA1-related, sheep
definition: Gaucher disease that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the GBA1 gene. Neonatal lambs display severe neurological disease with shaking and inability to stand. Their skin at birth is abnormal and thickened.

label: congenital muscular dystonia, ATP2A1-related, cattle
definition: Hereditary muscle myotonia in cattle due to a mutation in the ATP2A1 gene. This disease results in an inability to flex limbs and injurious falling. Animals also experience fatigue upon stimulation. The disorder in muscle function is due to a defect in the Ca2 pump.

label: limb-girdle muscular dystrophy, SGCD-related, dog
definition: Any muscular dystrophy that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the SGCD gene.

label: neurofibromatosis, NF1-related, pig
definition: Any neurofibromatosis that occurs in pigs due to a mutation in the NF1 gene.

label: oculocutaneous albinism, SLC45A2-related, Japanese medaka
definition: Any oculocutaneous albinism that occurs in Japanese medaka due to a mutation in the SLC45A2 gene.

label: oculocutaneous albinism, SLC45A2-related, western gorilla
definition: Any oculocutaneous albinism that occurs in western gorillas due to a mutation in the SLC45A2 gene.

label: oculocutaneous albinism, SLC45A2-related, dog
definition: Any oculocutaneous albinism that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the SLC45A2 gene.

label: oculocutaneous albinism, SLC45A2-related, cattle
definition: Any oculocutaneous albinism that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the SLC45A2 gene.

label: primary hyperoxaluria, GRHPR-related, domestic cat
definition: Any acute-onset renal failure from deposition of oxalate crystals in renal tubules that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the GRHPR gene.

label: primary hyperoxaluria, AGXT-related, dog
definition: Any nephropathy characterized by renal tubular necrosis with extensive oxalate crystal deposition that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the AGXT gene.

label: primary hyperoxaluria, AGXT-related, sheep
definition: Any nephropathy characterized by extensive oxalate crystal deposition that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the AGXT gene.

label: polycystic kidney disease, PKD2-related, domestic cat
definition: Any polycystic kidney disease that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the PKD2 gene.

label: polycystic kidney disease, PKD2-related, pig
definition: Any polycystic kidney disease that occurs in pigs due to a mutation in the PKD2 gene created using gene editing.

label: vitamin D dependent rickets, CYP27B1-related, dog
definition: Any vitamin D dependent rickets that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the CYP27B1 gene.

label: vitamin D dependent rickets type 1A, CYP27B1-related, domestic cat
definition: Any vitamin D dependent rickets that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the CYP27B1 gene.

label: pseudo vitamin D-deficiency rickets, CYP27B1-related, pig
definition: Any vitamin D dependent rickets that occurs in pigs due to a mutation in the CYP27B1 gene.

label: inherited rickets, DMP1-related, sheep
definition: Any inherited rickets in sheep due to a mutation in the DMP1 gene.

label: hypophosphatemic rickets, DMP1-related, rabbit
definition: Hypophosphatemic rickets in rabbits due to ablation of the DMP1 gene created using CRISPR/Cas9.

label: rod-cone dysplasia, PDE6A-related, dog
definition: Any progressive rod-cone degeneration that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the PDE6A gene.

label: achromatopsia, CNGB3-related, dog
definition: Any achromatopsia that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the CNGB3 gene.

label: achromatopsia, CNGB3-related, cattle
definition: Any achromatopsia that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the CNGB3 gene.

label: achromatopsia, CNGA3-related, dog
definition: Any achromatopsia that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the CNGA3 gene.

label: achromatopsia, CNGA3-related, sheep
definition: Any achromatopsia that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the CNGA3 gene.

label: cone-rod dystrophy, ADAM9-related, dog
definition: Any cone-rod dystrophy that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in ADAM9 gene.

label: rod-cone dysplasia, PCARE-related, dog
definition: Any progressive rod-cone degeneration that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the PCARE gene.

label: cone-rod dystrophy, PDE6B-related dog
definition: Any cone-rod dystrophy that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the PDE6B gene.

label: cone-rod dystrophy, IQCB1-related, black-footed cat
definition: Any cone-rod dystrophy that occurs in black-footed cats due to a mutation in the IQCB1 gene.

label: cone-rod dystrophy, IQCB1-related, dog
definition: Any cone-rod dystrophy that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the IQCB1 gene.

label: cone-rod dystrophy, GUCY2D-related, pig
definition: A disease created by lentiviral transgenesis to create pigs with a deleterious mutation in the GUCY2D gene known to cause cone-rod dystrophy 6 in humans.

label: glaucoma, LTBP2-related, domestic cat
definition: Any glaucoma that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the LTBP2 gene.

label: retinitis pigmentosa, RP1-related, cattle
definition: Any retinitis pigmentosa that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in RP1 gene.

label: progressive retinal atrophy, BBS4-related, dog
definition: Any progressive retinal atrophy in dogs due to a mutation in the BBS4 gene.

label: achromatopsia, PDE6C-related, Rhesus monkey
definition: Any achromatopsia that occurs in Rhesus monkey due to a mutation in the PDE6C gene.

label: Stargardt disease, ABCA4-related, dog
definition: Any progressive rod-cone degeneration that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the ABCA4 gene.

label: syndromic retinal atrophy, BBS7-related, Rhesus monkey
definition: Any syndromic retinal atrophy in Rhesus monkeys due to a mutation in the BBS7 gene.

label: syndromic retinal atrophy, BBS2-related, dog
definition: Any syndromic retinal atrophy in dogs due to a mutation in the BBS2 gene.

label: achromatopsia, non-human animal
definition: Achromatopsia that occurs in non-human animals.

label: leukocyte adhesion deficiency, non-human animal
definition: Leukocyte adhesion deficiency that occurs in non-human animals.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis or mucopolysaccharidosis-like disorder, non-human animal
definition: Mucopolysaccharidosis or mucopolysaccharidosis-like disorder that occurs in non-human animals.

label: cone-rod dystrophy, non-human animal
definition: Inherited cone-rod dystrophy that occurs in non-human animals.

label: Mycoplasmoides infection
definition: A disease caused by infection with Mycoplasmoides.

label: hypertensive urgency
definition: A hypertensive disorder that is characterized by marked elevation in blood pressure, such as systolic blood pressure greater than 180 mmHg or diastolic blood pressure greater than 110 mmHg, and without evidence of target organ damage, such as pulmonary edema, cardiac ischemia, neurologic deficits, or acute renal failure.

label: mitral valve insufficiency
definition: A mitral valve disorder characterized by incomplete valve closure.

label: persistent atrial fibrillation
definition: An atrial fibrillation disorder characterized by continuous atrial fibrillation that lasts for more than seven days.

label: precerebral artery stenosis
definition: A cerebrovascular disorder characterized by an abnormal narrowing of a precerebral artery.

label: paroxysmal atrial fibrillation
definition: An atrial fibrillation disorder characterized by intermittent atrial fibrillation that lasts less than seven days from onset.

label: acquired porphyria
definition: A porphyria disorder that is acquired during the lifetime of the individual.

label: PDE6C-related retinopathy
definition: Any retinopathy caused by variants in the PDE6C gene.

label: PDE6G-related retinopathy
definition: Any retinopathy caused by variants in the PDE6G gene.

label: LRIT3-related retinopathy
definition: Any retinopathy caused by variants in the LRIT3 gene.

label: IMPG1-related dominant retinopathy
definition: Any retinopathy caused by an autosomal dominant variant in the IMPG1 gene.

label: IMPG1-related recessive retinopathy
definition: Any retinopathy caused by autosomal recessive variants in the IMPG1 gene.

label: TTLL5-related retinopathy
definition: Any retinopathy caused by variants in the TTLL5 gene.

label: HGSNAT-related retinopathy
definition: Any isolated retinopathy caused by variants in the HGSNAT gene.

label: FZD4-related exudative vitreoretinopathy
definition: Any exudative vitreoretinopathy caused by a variant in the FZD4 gene.

label: BBS7-related ciliopathy
definition: Any ciliopathy caused by variants in the BBS7 gene.

label: BBS1-related ciliopathy
definition: Any ciliopathy caused by variants in the BBS1 gene.

label: BBS4-related ciliopathy
definition: Any ciliopathy caused by variants in the BBS4 gene.

label: BBS12-related ciliopathy
definition: Any ciliopathy caused by variants in the BBS12 gene.

label: LZTFL1-related ciliopathy
definition: Any ciliopathy caused by variants in the LZTFL1 gene.

label: BBS5-related ciliopathy
definition: Any ciliopathy caused by variants in the BBS5 gene.

label: BBS2-related ciliopathy
definition: Any ciliopathy caused by variants in the BBS2 gene.

label: TTC8-related ciliopathy
definition: Any ciliopathy caused by variants in the TTC8 gene.

label: MKKS-related ciliopathy
definition: Any ciliopathy caused by variants in the MKKS gene.

label: IMPDH1-related retinopathy
definition: Any retinopathy caused by a variant in the IMPDH1 gene.

label: PROM1-related recessive retinopathy
definition: Any retinopathy caused by autosomal recessive variants in the PROM1 gene.

label: PROM1-related dominant retinopathy
definition: Any retinopathy caused by an autosomal dominant variant in the PROM1 gene.

label: DHDDS-CDG
definition: Any congenital disorder of glycosylation caused by variants in the DHDDS gene.

label: PRPH2-related retinopathy
definition: Any retinopathy caused by a variant or variants in the PRPH2 gene.

label: PROM1-related retinopathy
definition: Any retinopathy caused by variants in the PROM1 gene.
